description: I. Letter dated 20/02/2009 from newspaper editors Marc Reeves ('Birmingham Post'), Steve Dyson ('Birmingham Mail') and David Brookes ('Coventry Telegraph') to Lord Mandelson regarding their concerns for the British automobile industry during the current economic recession. 1 p. II. Letter dated 02/03/2009 from Lord Mandelson to Marc Reeves regarding Government support for the automobile industry during the recession. 3 p.
department: Dept for Business, Enterprise and Regulatory Reform
